greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of order-preserving or order-reversing full contraction mappings (of an n-chain) with exactly k fixed points.
reference: A. D. Adeshola, V. Maltcev and A. Umar, Combinatorial results for certain semigroups of order-preserving full contraction mappings of a finite chain, (submitted).
example: T (4,0) = 6 because there are exactly 6 order-preserving or order-reversing full contraction mappings (of a 4-chain) with no fixed point, namely: (2111), (3321), (3322), (4321), (4322), (4443).
results.author: _Abdullahi Umar_, Feb 28 2013
